title: twig abs filter
description: The abs filter returns the absolute value of a number.

title: twig batch filter
description: The batch filter splits a sequence into smaller sequences of a given size.

title: twig capitalize filter
description: The capitalize filter capitalizes the first letter of a string.

title: twig column filter
description: The column filter returns the values from a single column of a sequence.

title: twig convert_encoding filter
description: The convert_encoding filter converts a string to a different character encoding.

title: twig country_name filter
description: The country_name filter returns the name of a country.

title: twig currency_name filter
description: The currency_name filter returns the name of a currency.

title: twig currency_symbol filter
description: The currency_symbol filter returns the symbol of a currency.

title: twig data_uri filter
description: The data_uri filter encodes a file as a data URI.

title: twig date filter
description: The date filter formats a date.

title: twig date_modify filter
description: The date_modify filter modifies a date.

title: twig default filter
description: The default filter returns the default value when the value of the variable is null.

title: twig escape filter
description: The escape filter escapes a string.

title: twig first filter
description: The first filter returns the first element of a sequence.

title: twig format filter
description: The format filter formats a number.

title: twig format_currency filter
description: The format_currency filter formats a number as a currency amount.

title: twig format_date filter
description: The format_date filter formats a date.

title: twig format_datetime filter
description: The format_datetime filter formats a date and time.

title: twig format_number filter
description: The format_number filter formats a number.

title: twig format_time filter
description: The format_time filter formats a time.

title: twig html_to_markdown filter
description: The html_to_markdown filter converts HTML to Markdown.

title: twig inky_to_html filter
description: The inky_to_html filter converts Inky code to HTML.

title: twig inline_css filter
description: The inline_css filter inlines CSS styles.

title: twig join filter
description: The join filter concatenates the elements of a sequence.

title: twig json_encode filter
description: The json_encode filter encodes a variable as JSON.

title: twig keys filter
description: The keys filter returns the keys of a map.

title: twig language_name filter
description: The language_name filter returns the name of a language.

title: twig last filter
description: The last filter returns the last element of a sequence.

title: twig length filter
description: The length filter returns the length of a sequence.

title: twig locale_name filter
description: The locale_name filter returns the name of a locale.

title: twig lower filter
description: The lower filter converts a string to lowercase.

title: twig map filter
description: The map filter applies a filter to each element of a sequence.

title: twig markdown_to_html filter
description: The markdown_to_html filter converts Markdown to HTML.

title: twig merge filter
description: The merge filter merges two arrays.

title: twig nl2br filter
description: The nl2br filter converts newlines to HTML line breaks.

title: twig number_format filter
description: The number_format filter formats a number.

title: twig raw filter
description: The raw filter marks a variable as safe.

title: twig reduce filter
description: The reduce filter reduces a sequence to a single value.

title: twig replace filter
description: The replace filter replaces values in a string.

title: twig reverse filter
description: The reverse filter reverses a sequence.

title: twig round filter
description: The round filter rounds a number.

title: twig slice filter
description: The slice filter slices a sequence.

title: twig slug filter
description: The slug filter converts a string to a slug.

title: twig sort filter
description: The sort filter sorts a sequence.

title: twig spaceless filter
description: The spaceless filter removes whitespace between HTML tags.

title: twig split filter
description: The split filter splits a string into an array.

title: twig striptags filter
description: The striptags filter strips HTML and PHP tags from a string.

title: twig timezone_name filter
description: The timezone_name filter returns the name of a timezone.

title: twig title filter
description: The title filter converts a string to title case.

title: twig trim filter
description: The trim filter removes whitespace from the beginning and end of a string.

title: twig u filter
description: The u filter converts a string to a Symfony String object.

title: twig upper filter
description: The upper filter converts a string to uppercase.

title: twig url_encode filter
description: The url_encode filter encodes a string for use in a URL.
